ovdesc.p: This table is used by the securities report request sub-system and contains the names of those reports, together with their associated report number, which may be requested for printing directly by the users.

desc.p: Unique reference which identifies the Security module (SC) REPORT TYPE record.
1 to 5 type S (uppercase alpha or numeric) characters. (Mandatory input)
1st Character must be a number from 1-9
2nd character must be "A"
3rd to 5th character will allow alpha numeral.
Describes in abbreviated form the SC.Report.Type.

This field may be expanded to allow the user to enter the Description of the SC.Report.Type in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language as defined in the Language table and will indicate to the user the Language in which the Description is to be entered.
3 to 15 type SS (uppercase alpha or numeric, first character must be alpha) characters. Multilanguage field. (Mandatory input.)
Standard T24 alphanumeric field.
A maximum of 14 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the SC.VAL.PARAM.NBK file.
Describes the SC.Report.Type.

This field may be expanded to allow the user to enter the Description of the SC.Report.Type in various languages. Each expansion of the field will correspond to a new language as defined in the Language table and will indicate to the user the Language in which the Description is to be entered.
3 to 35 type AA (alphanumeric, first character must be alpha) characters. Multilanguage field (Mandatory input)
Specifies whether the report is external or not.
This field has been replaced by the field EXTERNAL REP (field 3.1) in the application OL.VAL.REPS.
Only Y(es) or N(o). be alpha) characters. (Mandatory input.)
Indicates the required version of the valuation report which is to be run.
As to which file to point to depends upon the value entered in the field VALUATION.SUBR (9) on the SC.PARAMETER file.
If this field is left blank then it is assumed that the basic T24 revaluation format is to be used.
Upto 25 type A (alphanumeric) characters. (Optional input.)
Must exist on the SC.VAL.PARAM.*** applicable to the T24 user - where *** denotes the T24 user's COMPANY mnemonic.
